calculator.title: Increase your credit card limit
calculator.detail: Increase your credit card limit up to CZK 300,000 fully online without visiting a branch.

slider.minIncreaseInfo: The increase must be at least CZK 2,000.

calculator.info:
Your credit card will remain physically with you.
We will only increase its credit limit.
